member.name: T:VMManager.Common.Models.AppSettings
member.summary: Represents application-wide persisted user preferences and system settings.

member.name: T:VMManager.Common.Models.HostSettings
member.summary: Represents persisted configuration for a Hyper-V host, including hostname, the list of virtual machines it manages, and its criticality status. Used in scheduling, export/restore logic, and settings serialization.

member.name: P:VMManager.Common.Models.HostSettings.HostName
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier or network-resolvable name of the host. This can be a NetBIOS name, DNS name, or IP address.

member.name: P:VMManager.Common.Models.HostSettings.VirtualMachines
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of virtual machine names hosted on this Hyper-V host. Used to associate scheduled backup or orchestration logic to specific VMs.

member.name: P:VMManager.Common.Models.HostSettings.IsCritical
member.summary: Indicates whether this host is marked as critical in orchestration logic. Critical hosts may have delayed shutdown sequences or restricted operations.

member.name: T:VMManager.Common.Models.RdpSettings
member.summary: Stores Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) credential information for a host. Used for automated remote desktop connection launches.

member.name: P:VMManager.Common.Models.RdpSettings.Username
member.summary: Gets or sets the username used when initiating RDP sessions. Typically in the format DOMAIN\\Username or just Username.

member.name: P:VMManager.Common.Models.RdpSettings.EncryptedPassword
member.summary: Gets or sets the encrypted password associated with the RDP user. The password should be securely stored and decrypted only at runtime.

member.name: T:VMManager.Common.Services.ConfigService
member.summary: Provides access to application configuration settings.

member.name: M:VMManager.Common.Services.ConfigService.#ctor
